short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cruise through recruiting season with this powerful WaterlooWorks companion app

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our extension scrapes information directly from WaterlooWorks. We then build features around this data which you can use at https://uwwave.ca. You can also export this data for your own use.

- A dense job list that has just the information you care about
- Fast search and filter that updates the job list instantly on the page
- More filtering options (e.g. 4/8 month, SWPP, external application required)
- Search and filters encoded in the url for easy saving and sharing
- Custom shortlists
- Permalinks to WaterlooWorks jobs

Power your job search with new information:
- Parsed and estimated salary from the job posting
- Skills match percentage to your resume
- AI generated keywords
- Student community sourced information (e.g. compensation and reviews)
- Salaries and reviews from InternCompass and r/uwaterloo megathread
- Public information on companies from the web
